members.member:
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
Returns the contents of the IniFile in a text or HTML format
Optional, defaults to false. Carriage return/linefeeds are converted to HTML.
[TDavis] 1/19/2004 Created
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
Contructor called when creating a new IniFile. Requires a filename value.
The path to the file to be edited. Optional, defaults to true. If the file does not exist, it is created.
[TDavis] 1/19/2004 Created
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------

member.name: M:WRDB.IniFile.clsIniFile.Initialize(System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Call this only if using New without parameters
member.param: The path to the file to be edited.
Optional, defaults to true. If the file does not exist, it is created.

members.member:
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
Adds a key/value to a given section. If the section does not exist, it is created.
The name of the key to add. If the key alreadys exists, then no action is taken. The value to assign to the new key. The section to add the new key to. If it does not exist, it is created. Optional, defaults to false. Will create the key in commented state. Optional. Will insert the new key prior to the specified key.
If the section does not exist, it will be created. If the 'IsCommented' option is true, then the newly created section will also be commented. If the 'InsertBefore' option is used, the specified key does not exist, then the new key is simply added to the section. If the section the key is being added to is commented, then the key will be commented as well.
[TDavis] 1/19/2004 Created
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
Adds a section to the IniFile. If the section already exists, then no action is taken.
The name of the section to add. Optional, defaults to false. Will add the section in a commented state.
[TDavis] 1/19/2004 Created
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
Returns an arraylist of Key objects in a given Section. Section must exist.
The name of the Section to retrieve the keys from.
[TDavis] 1/19/2004 Created
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
Comments a given section, including all of the keys contained in the section.
The name of the Section to comment.
Keys that are already commented will not preserve their comment status if 'UnCommentSection' is used later on.
[TDavis] 1/19/2004 Created
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
Uncomments a given section, and all of its keys.
The name of the Section to uncomment.
Any keys in the section that were previously commented will be uncommented after this function.
[TDavis] 1/19/2004 Created
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
Comments a given key in a given section. Both the key and the section must exist.
The name of the key to comment. The name of the section the key is in.
[TDavis] 1/19/2004 Created
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
Uncomments a given key in a given section. Both the key and section must exist.
The name of the key to uncomment. The name of the section the key is in.
[TDavis] 1/19/2004 Created
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
Renames a given key key in a given section. Both they key and the section must exist. The value is not altered.
The name of the key to be renamed. The name of the section the key exists in. The new name of the key.
[TDavis] 1/19/2004 Created
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
Changes the value of a given key in a given section. Both the key and the section must exist.
The name of the key whose value should be changed. The name of the section the key exists in. The new value to assign to the key.
[TDavis] 1/19/2004 Created
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
Returns the value of a key if it exists (otherwise an empty string).
The name of the Section to retrieve the keys from. The name of the Key to retrieve the value from. The value of the key.
[LCW] 1/11/2005 Created
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
Returns the value of a key if it exists (otherwise default value).
The name of the Section to retrieve the keys from. The name of the Key to retrieve the value from. Default text if key not found The value of the key.
[LCW] 1/11/2005 Created
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
Sets the value of a key if it exists (otherwise creates it).
The name of the Section to set the keys to. The name of the Key to set the value to. Value to assign to key To speed up process, include default value such that the key will not be written if the KeyValue is the same as the default
[LCW] 2/11/2005 Created
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
Deletes a given section. The section must exist. All the keys in the section will also be deleted.
The name of the section to be deleted.
[TDavis] 1/19/2004 Created
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
Deletes a given key in a given section. Both the key and the section must exist.
The name of the key to be deleted. The name of the section the key exists in.
[TDavis] 1/19/2004 Created
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
Moves a key from one section to another. Both the key and the section must exist, as must the section to move the key to.
The name of the key to be moved. The name of the section the key exists in. The name of the section to move the key to.
[TDavis] 1/19/2004 Created
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
Saves the inifile to the specified filename in XML format.
The name of the file to save the inifile to. Optional, defaults to nothing. May pass an encoding object (such as UTF-8) here.
[TDavis] 1/19/2004 Created
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
Retrieves the stored values of a form previously saved with funciton SaveFormSettings
The form object to restore the values to.
[TDavis] 1/19/2004 Created
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
